commit message:
Minor UI adjustments

- Adjusted margins
- Cleaned up colors.

Added checkbox to hide lock screen warning.

References #4

Added string for UI Checkbox to hide lock screen warning.

References #4

Added DeviceAdminManager helper class.

- TODO: Move all Device Admin code from MainFragment to this class.

References #15

Migrated Device Admin functionality into DeviceAdminManager

Fixes #15

Implemented the ability to silently monitor lock screen warnings.

- Instead of using setMaximumFailedPasswordsForWipe policy we can silently monitor unlock attempts and wipe when necessary. This will hide lock screen warning.

References #4

Added exception handling and check for API level 21

- Due to AOSP bug in API level 21, we cant check the number of failed unlock attempts. Hence we hide the checkbox for this option on devices running API level 21. We also verify the functionality before enabling protection.

This references #4

Merge pull request #16 from Zyg0te/stealth-mode

Added option to check for number of failed unlock attempts manually and wipe when neccessary. This bypasses the lock screen warning message making the protection more stealthy. Does not work on Android 5.0/5.0.1
Fixed an issue where device administration status was not updated correctly.

Updated versioning information.

versionCode incremented to 9.
versionName adjsuted to 1.0.8

Updated translations.

- English placeholder strings added to the Finnish and Chinese translations pending updates.
